name: Friday The 13th: Fan Game by Bootleg Coward *READ DESC*
name_original: Friday The 13th: Fan Game by Bootleg Coward *READ DESC*
description:
RIGHT NOW THIS GAME IS A DEMO, THIS IS ALSO MY FIRST GAME AND I WORKED HARD, ok

Made with RPG Maker 2003,

My first game, A take on the Jason slasher films. This was made for fun,

HOW TO DOWNLOAD: The zip file is called FT13, open it and find the application called "RGP_RT.exe" click that

Also you have to find a gravestone when Jason chases you

Website for other games:

https://sites.google.com/view/bootlegcowardstudios/home
